General.Name: Sphere 3D Corp
General.Description: Sphere 3D Corp. engages in the bitcoin mining business. The company is involved with bitcoin mining pool operators as its customers to provide a service to perform hash calculations for the mining pool operators. The company is based in Stamford, Connecticut.
